# Tender Announcement
# __________________________________
## Security Guard Services

**Bid Solicitation ID:** M5000-23-05483/A
**Bid Number:** CB-8754-79369703
**Publication Date:** 2023-09-05
**Tender Closing Date:** 2023-10-03T16:00:00
**Amendment Date:** 2023-10-19
**Tender Status:** Cancelled

**Overview**

The Royal Canadian Mounted Police (RCMP) requires Security Guard services for its Headquarters building located in Iqaluit, Nunavut Territories.

**Contract Period**

The contract period will be six months from the date of contract, with an irrevocable option to extend it for up to three additional one-year periods.

**Security Requirement**

This solicitation contains a security requirement that must be met.

**Basis of Selection**

The selection will be based on the highest combined rating of technical merit and price.

**Documents**

Tenders must be submitted to the RCMP Bid Receiving Unit as per page one of the Request for Proposal. Refer to the attached tender documents for further information, including the attached Security Guard Services RFP document and Annex F (List of Names for Integrity Verification Form).

**Important Notes**

The procurement is subject to the Nunavut Land Claims Agreement.

The RCMP has adopted the Integrity Regime administered by Public Services and Procurement Canada.

Tenders must be submitted in either French or English and must be received by 16:00:00 on the tender closing date.

**Indigenous Procurement**

The RCMP encourages Indigenous businesses to participate in this procurement and promotes the use of the Indigenous Business Directory to increase visibility and access to federal government contracts.

For more information on the Indigenous Business Directory and procurement opportunities, visit [www.canada.ca/indigenousbusinessdirectory](http://www.canada.ca/indigenousbusinessdirectory).
